price: Bã dõmin wani Littãfi daga Allah ba, wanda ya gabãta,* dã azãba mai girma daga Allah tã shãfe ku a cikin abin da kuka kãma.
arabic: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: * Abin da ya gabãta na Littãfi shi ne, amma Allah ne Masanin haƙĩƙa, abin da yake a cikin sũrar Ãl Imrãna, ãyã ta l59, inda aka bai wa Annabi umurnin ya yi shãwara da Sahabbansa ga abin da ya shãfi yãƙi, sa'an nan kuma ya dõgara ga Allah wajen zartar da abin da ya zãɓã daga shãwarar da suka bã shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lawlā kitābun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhadhtum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
